dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.data
dt-option.summary: Set the placeholder text for the SearchBuilder data select element

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.data` changes what will be displayed for the placeholder text of the SearchBuilder's data select.

dt-option.description: This will set the placeholder text for the data select element, by default this is `'Data'`. This dom element is available in custom conditions and plugins also.
